title: How long will the houses being moved for the new Publix shopping center be able to be stored on the Covils other property along Middle Sound Loop Road?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/06/how-long-will-the-houses-moved-for-the-new-publix-off-south-college-road-remain-on-the-covils-property-along-middle-sound-loop-road/
